resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107375</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107375</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202771</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Story Tellers and Poets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte-Erzähler und Dichter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conteurs et poèts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Caixeiros de história e poetas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cassieri di storia e poets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αφηγητές και ποιητές ιστορίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cajeros de historia y poetas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will examine the style, purpose, and organization of folktales and poetry in order to gain a deeper understanding and appreciation of both genres. With this knowledge, students will use the word choice and repetition of traditional folktales to transform them into modern poetry.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer überprüfen die Art, den Zweck und
die Organisation von folktales und von Poesie, um ein tieferes 
Verständnis und eine Anerkennung beider Genren zu gewinnen. Mit
diesem Wissen verwenden Kursteilnehmer die Wortwahl und die 
Wiederholung der traditionellen folktales, um sie in moderne Poesie 
umzuwandeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants examineront le modèle, le but, et 
l'organisation des folktales et de la poésie afin de gagner un 
arrangement et une appréciation plus profonds des deux genres. 
Avec cette connaissance, les étudiants emploieront le choix de 
mot et la répétition des folktales traditionnels pour les 
transformer en poésie moderne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes examinarão o estilo, a finalidade, 
e a organização dos folktales e da poesia a fim ganhar uma 
compreensão e uma apreciação mais profundas de ambos os genres. 
Com este conhecimento, os estudantes usarão a escolha da 
palavra e a repetição de folktales tradicionais transformá-los na 
poesia moderna.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi esamineranno lo stile, lo scopo e 
l'organizzazione dei folktales e della poesia per guadagnare una 
comprensione e un apprezzamento più profondi di entrambi i 
generi. Con questa conoscenza, gli allievi useranno la 
scelta di parola e la ripetizione dei folktales tradizionali per 
trasformarli nella poesia moderna.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα εξετάσουν το ύφος, το σκοπό, και την 
οργάνωση των folktales και της ποίησης προκειμένου να κερδηθούν
μια βαθύτερες κατανόηση και μια εκτίμηση και των δύο υφών. 
Με αυτήν την γνώση, οι σπουδαστές θα χρησιμοποιήσουν την 
επιλογή λέξης και την επανάληψη των παραδοσιακών folktales για 
να τους μετασχηματίσουν στη σύγχρονη ποίηση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes examinarán el estilo, el 
propósito, y la organización de folktales y de la poesía para ganar
una comprensión y un aprecio más profundos de ambos géneros. 
Con este conocimiento, los estudiantes utilizarán la opción de
la palabra y la repetición de folktales tradicionales para 
transformarlos en poesía moderna.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>

              <value>author</value>

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107375</entry>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
